FROM accounting_sales_admin a INNER JOIN admin b ON a.admin_username = b.admin_username INNER JOIN company c ON a.company_idx = c.company_idx INNER JOIN inventory d ON a.inventory_idx = d.inventory_idx INNER JOIN company_contract e ON a.company_contract_idx = e.company_contract_idx;
